references.paper_title: A pseudo-semantic loss for autoregressive models with logical constraints
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel loss function to improve the performance of autoregressive language models when logical constraints are present.

references.paper_title: Efficient string matching: an aid to bibliographic search
references.reason: This foundational paper introduces the Aho-Corasick algorithm, which is used in the current work to efficiently construct DFAs for various logical constraints.

references.paper_title: SPICE: Semantic propositional image caption evaluation
references.reason: This paper introduces the SPICE metric, which is used in the current work to evaluate the quality of the generated text.
This paper describes instruction-tuning techniques, a widely used approach for fine-tuning LLMs, upon which the current work's base models are built.

references.paper_title: Training verifiers to solve math word problems
references.reason: This paper introduces the GSM benchmark, which the current work uses to demonstrate the application of the proposed approach beyond traditional language generation tasks.
